security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a payroll authorization form for Ernestine G. Johnson, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing her employment as a Staff Investigator and related payroll actions.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to the payroll records of Ernestine G. Johnson, a Staff Investigator for the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The documents include a Final Determination Notification regarding the postponement of certain information (Social Security numbers) to protect personal privacy, payroll authorization forms detailing Johnson's appointment, salary, and termination actions, and internal memoranda related to her employment and committee payroll procedures. The documents span from 1977 to 1979 and involve approvals and certifications by authorizing officials like Louis Stokes, Chairman of the HSCA.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records: Ernestine G. Johnson
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
